getVisitor

public query getVisitor(string visitorID)
Returns a visitor record from the database

Parameters:
visitorID - ID of the visitor to return

getVisitorCombinations

public query getVisitorCombinations(string visitorID)
Returns a visitor query along with any combinations the visitor received

Parameters:
visitorID - ID of the visitor to return combinations for

getVisitorConversions

public query getVisitorConversions(string visitorID)
Returns a query of conversions for a given visitor

Parameters:
visitorID - ID of the visitor to return conversions for

getVisitorTags

public query getVisitorTags(string visitorID, array filter)
get all, or some of the visitor tags

Parameters:
visitorID - ID of the visitor to return tags for
filter - a string, list or array of tags specifically look for against the visitor

insertConversion

public string insertConversion(string visitorID, string name, [string value=''], [string units=''], [date conversionDate='[runtime expression]'])
Records a conversion for a visitor

Parameters:
visitorID - The visitor ID to record the conversion for
name - The name/type of this conversion
value - The value to record for this conversion
units - The unit value to record for this conversion
conversionDate - The date the conversion happened

insertVisitor

public string insertVisitor(string testName, struct variationData, [date visitDate='[runtime expression]'])
Inserts a visitor to the database when they come across a test

Parameters:
testName - The test this visitor is being recorded for
variationData - A data structure of the Sections and Variation this customer will see
visitDate - First visit date/time of this visitor

insertVisitorTag

public void insertVisitorTag(string visitorID, string tag)
insert a visitor tag

Parameters:
visitorID - ID of the visitor to insert a tag for
tag - the tag to insert
